comment._content: It's actually Karl with a "K". He was a sculptor. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karl_Bitter

comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: Viennese-American sculptor.  His name is most often spelled "Karl".   He was killed in 1915 by being struck by a car.

comment.author: 12257577@N00
comment._content: obviously over-interpreting here, but it is interesting how the texture of his coat is in sharper focus than the features of his face. this recreates in the me the feeling I had when I looked at grownups as a child: what caught my attention was often a detail in their attire at my eye level; their face was too distant for me to pay attention too (and their words too, more often than not).

comment._content: Beautiful capture absolutely lovely ! Well done!! Thank you for your Encouragements............

comment._content: Looks like there is a date written on the left side, right below the bottom rail, running down to the wall. It looks like 4/10/12.
